function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sophisticated tracking methods may lead to invasion of privacy and surveillance concerns.","Impact":"Loss of privacy, potential abuse of personal data.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection laws, transparency in data collection and usage.","Technologies":"Encryption, decentralized data storage, privacy-preserving algorithms.","People":"Citizens, residents, visitors.","Owner":"Government, data protection authorities, technology companies."},{"Description":"Interactive maps showing infected people's locations may lead to stigmatization and discrimination.","Impact":"Social stigma, discrimination, violation of privacy.","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, protection of individuals' privacy, anonymous data sharing.","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, data encryption, secure data sharing protocols.","People":"Infected individuals, their contacts, general public.","Owner":"Health authorities, government, technology companies."},{"Description":"Use of location and health data for contact tracing may lead to potential misuse and exploitation of sensitive information.","Impact":"Misuse of personal health data, exploitation of sensitive information.","Mitigation":"Data protection regulations, consent-based data sharing, limited data retention.","Technologies":"Data anonymization, secure data storage, consent management tools.","People":"Users of tracking apps, individuals identified as infected.","Owner":"Health authorities, technology companies, data protection authorities."}]}
